participant_1.name: Sophia Taylor
participant_1.personality: Outspoken and passionate about social issues, enjoys engaging in discussions about equality and sustainability.
participant_1.background: i buy only organic food products. i love social media especially twitter. i spend a lot of time browsing the internet. i am a feminist.

participant_2.name: Liam Anderson
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and materialistic, enjoys luxury items and often seeks validation through his possessions.
participant_2.background: my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping.
